attributes.action: give equal rights to open university students to get maintenance loans from sfe
attributes.additional_details:
Those who study with the open university in wales do not have this restriction. I want to get these equal rights for everyone else who studies in the UK. 

These equal rights would enable people in a position who cannot get to a university due to commitments i.e family and/or work to be able to undertake a university course without the worries of finance.
attributes.background: The Open University (OU) students do not get the same access to a maintenance loan from sfe as other students. The only way OU students can get a maintenance loan is if they are disabled, for all of those who are not disabled, they are automatically denied.
